products.name: deploy-arch-ibm-enterprise
products.label: Cloud automation for IBM Enterprise
products.short_description: Creates an IBM enterprise account and invite users to the account.
products.long_description: This deployable architecture automates the creation of an IBM enterprise account under a parent IBM enterprise and invite users to the new account. Optionally it also creates an account group in order to organize and manage accounts hierarchically and provisions creation of multiple access groups to be assigned to the newly invited users. For more details on IBM enterprise, [see here](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/enterprise-management?topic=enterprise-management-what-is-enterprise).

features.title: Account and Account Group
features.description: Creates account under parent enterprise account. Optionally provides ability to create account group.

features.title: Trusted Profile
features.description: Creates trusted profile to be assumed by the account service ID to invite users.

features.title: Access Groups
features.description: Creates multiple access groups under the new account and adds new users to it.

features.title: Invite Users
features.description: Sends invites to new users for joining the new enterprise account.

products.support_details: This product is in the community registry, as such support is handled through the originated repo. If you experience issues please open an issue in that repository [https://github.com/terraform-ibm-modules/terraform-ibm-enterprise/issues](https://github.com/terraform-ibm-modules/terraform-ibm-enterprise/issues). Please note this product is not supported via the IBM Cloud Support Center.

iam_permissions.notes: Required when you are creating account and account group under an IBM Enterprise.

features.description: Configured to use IBM secure by default standards, but can be edited to fit your use case.

diagrams.description:
**IBM Cloud Enterprise**

Description
This deployable architecture automates the structured setup and management of IBM Cloud Enterprise accounts and user access. It streamlines the creation of new accounts and account groups within an enterprise, enabling centralized governance.

Inviting Users and Access Group
This solution simplifies user onboarding by automating the invitation process and assigning users to pre-configured access groups, ensuring they have the correct permissions from the start. A trusted profile is established to securely facilitate these user invitations and manage IAM operations within the newly provisioned accounts.
